# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE - edit the master and reinstall.
# (/tmp/crontab.8Qumnw/crontab installed on Fri Feb 27 05:40:41 2026)
# (Cron version -- $Id: crontab.c,v 2.13 1994/01/17 03:20:37 vixie Exp $)
# Edit this file to introduce tasks to be run by cron.
# 
# Each task to run has to be defined through a single line
# indicating with different fields when the task will be run
# and what command to run for the task
# 
# To define the time you can provide concrete values for
# minute (m), hour (h), day of month (dom), month (mon),
# and day of week (dow) or use '*' in these fields (for 'any').
# 
# Notice that tasks will be started based on the cron's system
# daemon's notion of time and timezones.
# 
# Output of the crontab jobs (including errors) is sent through
# email to the user the crontab file belongs to (unless redirected).
# 
# For example, you can run a backup of all your user accounts
# at 5 a.m every week with:
# 0 5 * * 1 tar -zcf /var/backups/home.tgz /home/
# 
# For more information see the manual pages of crontab(5) and cron(8)
# 
# m h  dom mon dow   command


# Hourly
5 * * * * psql -d madrone -c "SELECT snapshot_store_apps();" 
7 * * * * psql -d madrone -c "SELECT snapshot_pub_domains();"
#43 * * * * psql -d madrone -c "REFRESH MATERIALIZED VIEW store_apps_updated_at"
#53 * * * * psql -d madrone -c "REFRESH MATERIALIZED VIEW store_apps_created_at"

# Weekly Cleanup
2 0 * * 1 psql -d madrone -c "DELETE FROM logging.store_apps_crawl WHERE crawled_at < CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '365 days';"  >> /var/log/refresh_mv.log 2>&1
3 0 * * 1 psql -d madrone -c "DELETE FROM logging.store_apps_audit WHERE stamp < CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '365 days';"  >> /var/log/refresh_mv.log 2>&1

# Multiple Per Day 3+
#0 */4 * * * psql -d madrone -c "REFRESH MATERIALIZED VIEW audit_dates"  >> /var/log/postgresql/refresh_mv.log 2>&1
0 */4 * * * psql -d madrone -c "REFRESH MATERIALIZED VIEW adtech.company_categories"  >> /var/log/postgresql/refresh_mv.log 2>&1
20 */8 * * * psql -d madrone -c "REFRESH MATERIALIZED VIEW public.category_mapping" >> /var/log/postgresql/refresh_mv.log 2>&1 
25 */8 * * * psql -d madrone -c "REFRESH MATERIALIZED VIEW public.mv_app_categories" >> /var/log/postgresql/refresh_mv.log 2>&1 
22 */8 * * * psql -d madrone -c "REFRESH MATERIALIZED VIEW public.store_apps_in_latest_rankings" >> /var/log/postgresql/refresh_mv.log 2>&1 
22 */10 * * * psql -d madrone -c "REFRESH MATERIALIZED VIEW CONCURRENTLY frontend.store_app_ranks_latest" >> /var/log/postgresql/refresh_mv.log 2>&1 

# Daily
0 4 * * * psql -d madrone -c "REFRESH MATERIALIZED VIEW CONCURRENTLY frontend.keyword_scores"  >> /var/log/postgresql/refresh_mv.log 2>&1


# Zscores
24 2 * * * psql -d madrone -c "REFRESH MATERIALIZED VIEW CONCURRENTLY frontend.z_scores_top_apps" >> /var/log/postgresql/refresh_mv.log 2>&1 

01 5 * * * psql -d madrone -c "REFRESH MATERIALIZED VIEW CONCURRENTLY frontend.adstxt_ad_domain_overview" >> /var/log/postgresql/refresh_mv.log 2>&1 
31 5 * * * psql -d madrone -c "REFRESH MATERIALIZED VIEW CONCURRENTLY frontend.adstxt_publishers_overview" >> /var/log/postgresql/refresh_mv.log 2>&1 

33 11 * * * psql -d madrone -c "REFRESH MATERIALIZED VIEW frontend.apps_new_weekly" >> /var/log/postgresql/refresh_mv.log 2>&1 
35 11 * * * psql -d madrone -c "REFRESH MATERIALIZED VIEW frontend.apps_new_monthly" >> /var/log/postgresql/refresh_mv.log 2>&1 
38 11 * * * psql -d madrone -c "REFRESH MATERIALIZED VIEW frontend.apps_new_yearly" >> /var/log/postgresql/refresh_mv.log 2>&1 

## Creatives, running often temporarily
10 */3 * * * psql -d madrone -c "REFRESH MATERIALIZED VIEW CONCURRENTLY frontend.api_call_countries;" >> /var/log/postgresql/refresh_mv.log 2>&1
15 */3 * * * psql -d madrone -c "REFRESH MATERIALIZED VIEW frontend.advertiser_creative_rankings_recent_month;" >> /var/log/postgresql/refresh_mv.log 2>&1 
17 */3 * * * psql -d madrone -c "REFRESH MATERIALIZED VIEW frontend.advertiser_creatives;" >> /var/log/postgresql/refresh_mv.log 2>&1 
19 */3 * * * psql -d madrone -c "REFRESH MATERIALIZED VIEW frontend.companies_creative_rankings;" >> /var/log/postgresql/refresh_mv.log 2>&1 

# VERY SLOW runs ~3am tw time
31 18 * * * psql -d madrone -c "REFRESH MATERIALIZED VIEW CONCURRENTLY frontend.adstxt_entries_store_apps" >> /var/log/postgresql/refresh_mv.log 2>&1 
22 08 * * * psql -d madrone -c "REFRESH MATERIALIZED VIEW CONCURRENTLY frontend.store_app_ranks_best_monthly" >> /var/log/postgresql/refresh_mv.log 2>&1 

## CONCURRENTLY ##

0 */4 * * * psql -d madrone -c "REFRESH MATERIALIZED VIEW CONCURRENTLY frontend.companies_open_source_percent" >> /var/log/postgresql/refresh_mv.log 2>&1 
1 */4 * * * psql -d madrone -c "REFRESH MATERIALIZED VIEW CONCURRENTLY frontend.store_apps_overview" >> /var/log/postgresql/refresh_mv.log 2>&1 
2 */4 * * * psql -d madrone -c "REFRESH MATERIALIZED VIEW CONCURRENTLY frontend.companies_sdks_overview" >> /var/log/postgresql/refresh_mv.log 2>&1 
12 */4 * * * psql -d madrone -c "REFRESH MATERIALIZED VIEW CONCURRENTLY frontend.latest_sdk_scanned_apps" >> /var/log/postgresql/refresh_mv.log 2>&1 

14 03 * * * psql -d madrone -c "REFRESH MATERIALIZED VIEW CONCURRENTLY public.developer_store_apps" >> /var/log/postgresql/refresh_mv.log 2>&1 

58 11 * * * psql -d madrone -c "REFRESH MATERIALIZED VIEW CONCURRENTLY frontend.app_keyword_rank_stats" >> /var/log/postgresql/refresh_mv.log 2>&1 


# These should run after the daily S3 imports
20 2 * * * psql -d madrone -c "REFRESH MATERIALIZED VIEW CONCURRENTLY public.app_global_metrics_latest" >> /var/log/postgresql/refresh_mv.log 2>&1 

## SDK -> Company Flow 9AM
0 9 * * * psql -d madrone -c "REFRESH MATERIALIZED VIEW CONCURRENTLY adtech.sdk_strings" >> /var/log/postgresql/refresh_mv.log 2>&1
